p.e:
Try to strengthen your
defensive line and use
your troops to secure
more gold deposits.
If you want to create
tons of troops fast, you
need conveyor belts to
bring gold to your base.

Use the scrap on the
battlefield with builders
and wallers to reinforce
your position with walls
and turrets.

CHAPTER 4: ADVANCE

You can not fight for-
ever using only basic
troops.
Sooner or later you
need a bit more power,
and for that you need
OIL!!!

So get an Oil operation
going when you have a
decent base, and bring
that Oil to your factories
you'll need it.
